text: Koo, bali nende ibilenje biokhuchendela? Nohomba bali nende emikhono chiokhutilila? Nohomba bali nende tsimoni tsiabalolelanga? Nohomba bali nende amarwi kabawulilanga? Boola; lanje abamutsokaasinjia Nyasaye ninabo, mana mukhole obutobela bwenyu(bwokhusishia)- ne mulambesie ebisi biosi biosi tawe. (musishie toto nikali mbu munyala)
